first_tick_commands: execute unless score @s Heroes.Speed.Max matches 1.. run scoreboard players set @s Heroes.Speed.Max 40
execute unless score @s Heroes.Toggle.Speed matches 0.. run scoreboard players set @s Heroes.Toggle.Speed 0
commands: execute unless entity @s[scores={Powers.Augmented_Movement_Potential=1..}] unless entity @s[scores={Powers.Fake.Augmented_Movement_Potential=1..}] run superpower remove heroes:augmented_movement_potential
execute store result score @s Heroes.Speed.Damage run attribute @s minecraft:generic.attack_damage get
execute as @s if score @s Heroes.Speed >= @s Heroes.Speed.Max run scoreboard players operation @s Heroes.Speed = @s Heroes.Speed.Max

description.text: Through either natural or artificial means, you've obtained an ability that others would deem impossible. Be careful, as those who thirst for power may seek out what you now possess.

Toggle_Ability_Bar.title: Toggle Ability Bar
Toggle_Ability_Bar.description: Toggles off the ability bar for this power but keeps passives enabled.

commands: execute store result score @s Heroes.Speed.Stat run attribute @s minecraft:generic.movement_speed get 100

unlocking.command: execute anchored eyes positioned ^ ^ ^2.1 if entity @e[type=arrow,distance=..2]

commands: execute anchored eyes positioned ^ ^ ^2.1 as @e[type=arrow,distance=..2] run data modify entity @s inGround set value 1b
execute anchored eyes positioned ^ ^ ^2.1 as @e[type=arrow,distance=..2] run data modify entity @s pickup set value 1b
execute anchored eyes positioned ^ ^ ^2.1 as @e[type=arrow,distance=..2] run scoreboard players add @s Heroes.Stamina.Remove 1
execute anchored eyes positioned ^ ^ ^2.1 at @e[type=arrow,distance=..2] run tp @e[type=arrow,distance=..0.1] @s

Reflex_Dodge.title: Reflex Dodge
Reflex_Dodge.description: Using your incredible speed you are able to dodge any attack.

Speed_Barrage.title: Speed Barrage
Speed_Barrage.description: Using your incredible speed you are able to punch extremly fast in quick succesion allowing you to deal high DPS.

Wall_Run_Abil.title: Wall Running
Wall_Run_Abil.description: Using your incredible speed you are able to run up walls defying gravity itself!
commands: execute if entity @s[x_rotation=-90..-45,y_rotation=45..145] unless block ~-0.4 ~ ~ #heroes:climb_block run scoreboard players set @s Heroes.Speed.WallRun 1
execute if entity @s[x_rotation=-90..-45,y_rotation=-145..-45] unless block ~0.4 ~ ~ #heroes:climb_block run scoreboard players set @s Heroes.Speed.WallRun 2
execute if entity @s[x_rotation=-90..-45,y_rotation=-46..44] unless block ~ ~ ~0.4 #heroes:climb_block run scoreboard players set @s Heroes.Speed.WallRun 3
execute if entity @s[x_rotation=-90..-45,y_rotation=146..-144] unless block ~ ~ ~-0.4 #heroes:climb_block run scoreboard players set @s Heroes.Speed.WallRun 4
execute if entity @s[x_rotation=-90..-45,scores={Heroes.Speed.WallRun=1..}] if block ~ ~0.3 ~ #heroes:climb_block run scoreboard players add @s Heroes.Speed.WallRun.Anim 1
execute if entity @s[x_rotation=45..90,scores={Heroes.Speed.WallRun=1..}] if block ~ ~-0.3 ~ #heroes:climb_block run scoreboard players add @s Heroes.Speed.WallRun.Anim 1
